title: let's talk nautilus q
body: Does it have a bigger hitbox against champions than minions? It seems you can fire it on/next to a minion and if you're behind the minion it will hit. unless I had some weird model lag which tends to happen in this game.

replies.body: No what your not taking into account is that Champions have a bigger hit box then minions do.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jcTgQRqf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-12T09:16:16.192+0000)
>
> No what your not taking into account is that Champions have a bigger hit box then minions do.

especially cho and zac when they have a lot of HP
just did thresh hook through a minion too, what is going on?
Yah I played a game of Naut and got a "Should that really of hit?" vibe from a lot of my Q's idk it's definitely a weird ability

I do find it incredibly easy to land. 
It's much harder than a Thresh Q, however I can't compare it to Blitzcrank Q because I haven't played the robot.
The ability is very "champion attracted".
